name: The Machanguitos
description:
The Machanguitos, a 2D action game where a lone machungo wishes to exterminate the rest of their kind, without ever losing their smile.

Take aim and move carefully, as the machanguitos will not rest until they escape the wrath of the feared machungo in this fast-paced battle.

~ Controls ~

Arrow Keys - Left and right to move, up to jump.

Mouse - Take aim.

Left Mouse Click - Shoot.

~ Credits ~

Game made by AspariDev and KT. Fonts used from the Nb Pixel Font Bundle.
